resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user ( userID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, username TEXT, pbLink TEXT );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS keys ( userID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, key1 TEXT UNIQUE, key2 TEXT UNIQUE, FOREIGN KEY (userID) REFERENCES user(userID) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tweet ( tweetID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, userID INTEGER, time INTEGER, tweet TEXT, retweet INTEGER, favorite INTEGER, answers INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (userID) REFERENCES user(userID) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hometweet ( tweetID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, userID INTEGER, time INTEGER, tweet TEXT, retweet INTEGER, favorite INTEGER, answers INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (userID) REFERENCES user(userID) );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user ( userID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, bio TEXT, location TEXT, link TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (userID) REFERENCES user(userID));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trend ( trendpos INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, trendname TEXT, trendlink TEXT );
"SELECT * FROM tweet INNER JOIN user ON user.userID = tweet.userID ORDER BY time DESC"
"SELECT * FROM hometweet INNER JOIN user ON user.userID = hometweet.userID ORDER BY time DESC"
"SELECT * FROM trend ORDER BY trendpos ASC"
"SELECT * FROM keys ORDER BY trendpos ASC"
